description: This file defines a React functional component named TodoItem, which renders a single todo item with title, details, and action buttons for editing, deleting, and toggling completion, including SVG icons for each action.

methods.name: TodoItem
methods.description: Functional React component for displaying a todo item with optional action buttons.
